column4: Hi all, my main menu is messed up after upgrading from 9.04 to 9.10.  "Places" and "System" are both half the height of all other elements and it's very difficult to mouse over them. Help please!
Hi all, when I mouseover a contact in pidgin, the window pops up but is blank. Is something wrong with pidgin in 9.10?
Right on topic. No, i do not have the same problem,
